abstract: Judge Margaret M Sweeney of Court of Federal Claims in Washington orders government to release documents withheld from investors suing over 2012 decision made by officials to seize all Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac profits; decision is win for investors who argue extracting all profits from mortgage finance giants was illegal seizure of private property.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Ordered to Release Papers on Mortgage Giants
headline.main: Fannie and Freddie Investors Win Round in Suit Against U.S.

keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A mutual fund that is suing the government had sought documents regarding the 2012 decision to seize profits from Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac....
lead_paragraph: A mutual fund that is suing the government had sought documents regarding the 2012 decision to seize profits from Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.
